pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, June 23, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kigali, Rwanda

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a panel discussion entitled Keeping 1.5 Alive – The Glasgow Climate Pact and Building Momentum towards COP27.

Closed to media        

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Kigali Genocide Memorial.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion at the Commonwealth Business Forum.

Closed to media

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Rwanda, Paul Kagame.

Intare Conference Arena

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a brief media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a welcome reception and state banquet hosted by the President of Rwanda, Paul Kagame. Minister of Foreign Affairs Mélanie Joly will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcaster coverage of official arrivals
